query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `discount_coupons` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `code` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `description` text,
  `discount_type` enum('percentage', 'fixed') NOT NULL,
  `discount_value` decimal(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  `min_purchase_amount` decimal(10, 2),
  `max_discount_amount` decimal(10, 2),
  `valid_from` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `valid_until` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `max_usage_count` int,
  `current_usage_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `max_usage_per_merchant` int DEFAULT 1,
  `applicable_plan_ids` text,
  `is_active` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `discount_coupons_code_idx` (`code`),
  INDEX `discount_coupons_is_active_idx` (`is_active`),
  INDEX `discount_coupons_valid_from_idx` (`valid_from`),
  INDEX `discount_coupons_valid_until_idx` (`valid_until`)
)

  `description` text,
  `discount_type` enum('percentage', 'fixed') NOT NULL,

  `valid_from` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `valid_until` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `max_usage_count` int,
  `current_usage_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `max_usage_per_merchant` int DEFAULT 1,
  `applicable_plan_ids` text,
  `is_active` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `discount_coupons_code_idx` (`code`),
  INDEX `discount_coupons_is_active_idx` (`is_active`),
  INDEX `discount_coupons_valid_from_idx` (`valid_from`),
  INDEX `discount_coupons_valid_until_idx` (`valid_until`)
)
